Package org.tigr.antware.shared.util

Interface Summary
ICaller The ICaller interface simply defines a callBack() method.
IExceptionSource The IExceptionSource interface is implementd by all the classes that throw exceptions and need their exceptions to be handled by the ExceptionHandler class.
ILogger The ILogger interface is implementd by all the classes that have a logger stream that can be used to log messages
 

Class Summary
AppConfig The AppConfig class is a utility class that holds the application configuration properties and sets up the environment as needed.
CondorStatusUtils  
ConfigReader The ConfigReader class is a utility class that reads properties from the specified Java style properties file.
DateFormatter The class DateFormatter is a utility class that provides methods to format dates.
ExceptionHandler The class ExceptionHandler provides a way for handling all the exceptions that are thrown by the application.
ExtractArguments The class ExtractArguments is used to extract the command line options specified in the args array.
FileUtils The class FileUtils provides utility methods to test different types of documents.
Finer The class Finer models a debug level lower than DEBUG in the log4j level hierarchy.
Finest The class Finest models a debug level lower than FINER in the log4j level hierarchy.
GetOptLong The GetOptLong class provides java programs with a way to interpret and parse command line options.
IniReader This class can read configuration files that are in '.ini' file format and provides an interface to read string, integer and boolean values.
IniWriter The class IniWriter provides the methods to create a INI style file form a data structure that models the various sections and parameters within the sections.
Logger The class Logger extends the log4j logging by adding two additional log levels to the logging API.
RunSystemCommand The class RunSystemCommand is a utility class that provides methods to run a specified system command and grab the output and error from the system command and store it in strings that can be retrieved
SendMail The class SendMail is a utility class that provides methods to send an email using the mail client.
SGEStatusUtils  
StringUtils  
TestString TestStromg provides various static methods for testing string properties.
XMLUtils The class XMLUtils contains methods used to manipulate XML Elements
